body:
Ha, we're closing in (thanks to your persistence!): this is [ATen's scalar type checking](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/7b25cbbef9ffd894516c7a5f92eb62878a17445f/aten/src/ATen/TensorUtils.cpp#L143) (probably also look at stuff nearby) and this not being translated [to PyTorch types in the exception processing](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/7b25cbbef9ffd894516c7a5f92eb62878a17445f/torch/csrc/Exceptions.cpp#L31).
I think that's a separate issue from taking Python scalars, but I think I could provide a fix if we agree that this should change.
